name: Jatindra Kumar Deka
content: Dr. Jatindra Kumar Deka Professor Department of Computer Science and Engineering Indian Institute of Technology Guwahati Guwahati - 781039 Assam, India Phone(O): +91 (361) 2582354 Phone(R): +91 (361) 2584354 Fax: +91 (361) 2692787 Email-id: jatin[*AT]iitg.ernet.in Academic Profile B.
